name: Redis Expert Plugin
description: Ultra-focused Redis expert plugin. Master Redis data structures, patterns, optimization, clustering, and production deployment. Deep expertise in caching strategies, Pub/Sub, transactions, persistence, and advanced use cases.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Redis Expert
agents.description: Deep Redis expertise covering data structures, caching patterns, persistence, replication, clustering, Pub/Sub, Lua scripting, streams, and production optimization.

commands.name: redis-learn
commands.description: Learn Redis from fundamentals to advanced patterns with progressive learning paths

commands.name: redis-patterns
commands.description: Explore Redis design patterns: caching, sessions, queues, rate limiting, pub/sub, distributed locks

commands.name: redis-optimize
commands.description: Optimize Redis performance, memory usage, replication, and production deployments

commands.name: redis-code
commands.description: Get ready-to-use Redis code examples in Python, Node.js, Java, and Go

skills.name: redis-data-structures
skills.description: Master all Redis data structures: strings, lists, sets, sorted sets, hashes, streams with examples

skills.name: redis-patterns-advanced
skills.description: Advanced patterns: cache-aside, write-through, sessions, distributed locks, rate limiting

skills.name: redis-performance
skills.description: Performance optimization: memory management, pipelining, transactions, Lua scripting

skills.name: redis-production
skills.description: Production deployment: persistence (RDB/AOF), replication, clustering, monitoring, HA

skills.name: redis-pubsub-streams
skills.description: Pub/Sub messaging and Streams: real-time communication, event processing, durability
